page.title: 14Home life:A day in my life.
page.content: In the morning I wake up,pull off the continental quilt,climb out of bed,gather up my clothes from the cupboard,go downstairs and go into the bathroom.I go to the toilet and then get washed at the sink.Before breakfast I get dressed.For my breakfast I have toast and a cup of tea.By this time it is about 8.20am. I walk up to school and meet Stephanie.I arrive at school at about 9.00 o'clock we have lessons until 12.00 0'clock.We have dinner until 1.00 o'clock.Then we have lessons until 3.30pm after school I play out,playing chasing games with my friends until 6.00pm.Then I have my tea and go back out until 8.30pm.When I come in I have a bath and go to bed at 10.30pm.
